alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 15 at 6:43PM CDT until October 15 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Franklin County in west central Arkansas... Southwestern Crawford County in northwestern Arkansas... Northern Sebastian County in west central Arkansas... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 643 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Barling, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Charleston... Greenwood... Alma... Barling... Lavaca... Mulberry... Dyer... Branch... Bloomer... Excelsior... Fort Smith Regional Airport... Jenny Lind... Kibler... Central City... Concord... Shibley... Rye Hill... Vesta... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 5 and 20. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 10. Interstate 49 near mile marker 22. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
